import React from 'react'; import { FaFilter, FaTimes } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Filters = () => { const categories = [ "Engine", "Brakes", "Suspension", "Electrical", "Exhaust", "Cooling", "Fluids", "Interior", "Exterior", "Lighting" ]; const vendors = [ "EuroAutoParts", "IgnitionPro", "PerformanceFilters", "LubricantsPlus", "SuspensionWorld", "VisionAuto", "EngineSense", "ExhaustPro", "PowerSource", "InteriorGuard", "FuelSystems", "CoolingSystems" ]; return (

Filters

{/* Categories */}

Categories

{categories.map(category => ( ))}
{/* Vendors */}

Vendors

{vendors.map(vendor => ( ))}
{/* Price Range */}

Price Range

{/* Rating Filter */}

Rating

{[4, 3, 2, 1].map(rating => ( ))}
{/* Compatibility */}

Vehicle Compatibility

{/* Active Filters */}

Active Filters

Engine EuroAutoParts
); }; export default Filters;
